title: PVP.Net Patcher Kernel Has Stopped Working
body:
So i had this issue for a while and never found a solution so I uninstalled a long time ago and just tried to reinstall and I'm still getting the same issue.

Right-clicking and running as admin doesn't work and nor do the recommended permission fixes. My OS is basically letting anything under the sun run on my PC right now (which doesn't have me feeling particularly safe right now).

What are other solutions? I'm running Windows 10 with updated drivers on everything as far as I can tell.

The only difference between now when I try to play and before when I could successfully login and play is that I moved to Japan from USA.

But I don't see how that could cause the issue..?

replies.body:
Your PC settings might still have really strict security rules enabled, or an antivirus.  If the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide hasn't help, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you directly.

Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to obtain some logs for context, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you individually as soon as we can!
